content.rendered:
Sayan joined Regent in 2021. He has done his diploma certification from Film and Television Institute, Pune in Digital Video Editing. He is passionate about working closely with people to produce authentic and meaningful stories that engage and inspire.

He is experienced in working across different media and enjoys continuously developing his skills through exciting projects.
